trans-unit.source: Enables and configures object pooling for a component.
trans-unit.target: 啟用及設定元件的物件集區。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: If object pooling is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定物件集區時，它必須不停用 COM + 目錄;如果啟用 COM + 目錄中，它必須指定元件上。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ObjectPoolingAttribute, see the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ObjectPoolingAttribute 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.Enabled*>, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MaxPoolSize*>, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MinPoolSize*>, and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.CreationTimeout*> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref>類別和集合<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<> *> 成為其預設值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |Enabled|`true`| |MaxPoolSize|-1| |MinPoolSize|-1| |CreationTimeout|-1|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |啟用 |`true`| |Sqlserversink |-1 | |MinPoolSize |-1 | |CreationTimeout |-1 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.Enabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref>類別和集合<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.Enabled*>屬性。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable object pooling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用物件集區。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MaxPoolSize*> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MinPoolSize*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref>類別和集合<> *> 和<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The minimum pool size.
trans-unit.target: 最小集區大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum pool size.
trans-unit.target: 最大集區大小。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref> class and sets the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.Enabled*>, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MaxPoolSize*>, and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MinPoolSize*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref>類別和集合<> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MinPoolSize*>屬性。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute.MinPoolSize*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable object pooling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用物件集區。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The minimum pool size.
trans-unit.target: 最小集區大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum pool size.
trans-unit.target: 最大集區大小。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure while installing and configuring assemblies in the COM+ catalog.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 基礎結構會由內部呼叫時，安裝及設定 COM + 目錄中的組件。

trans-unit.source: Even though it is a public method, the AfterSaveChanges method is intended only to be used from within the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這是公用的方法，AfterSaveChanges 方法只被要從.NET Framework 基礎結構內使用。

trans-unit.source: It is sufficient for a developer to apply the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute> class attribute and set other members in its interface.
trans-unit.target: 就開發人員將套用足夠<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>類別屬性，並在其介面中設定其他成員。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A hash table that contains internal objects referenced by internal keys.
trans-unit.target: 包含內部索引鍵所參考的內部物件的雜湊資料表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method has made changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法已進行變更。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure while applying the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"></xref> class attribute to a serviced component.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 基礎結構會由內部呼叫時套用<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute"> </xref> class 屬性至服務的元件。

trans-unit.source: Even though it is a public method, the Apply method is intended only to be used from within the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 即使它是公用的方法時，套用方法只被要從.NET Framework 基礎結構內使用。

trans-unit.source: It is sufficient for a developer to apply the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute> class attribute and set other members in its interface.
trans-unit.target: 就開發人員將套用足夠<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>類別屬性，並在其介面中設定其他成員。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A hash table that contains an internal object to which object pooling properties are applied, referenced by an internal key.
trans-unit.target: 包含物件集區屬性會套用，內部索引鍵所參考的內部物件的雜湊資料表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if the method has made changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>如果此方法已進行變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time to wait for an object to become available in the pool before throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的物件可以使用集區中擲回例外狀況之前所等待的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: This value is in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long a client will wait, in milliseconds, for an object to be returned from the pool.
trans-unit.target: 指定了用戶端會等候，以毫秒為單位，傳回從集區物件。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether object pooling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用物件集區。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object pooling is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用物件集區。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure while installing and configuring assemblies in the COM+ catalog.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 基礎結構會由內部呼叫時，安裝及設定 COM + 目錄中的組件。

trans-unit.source: Even though it is a public method, the IsValidTarget method is intended only to be used from within the .NET Framework infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這是公用的方法，IsValidTarget 方法只被要從.NET Framework 基礎結構內使用。

trans-unit.source: It is sufficient for a developer to apply the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute> class attribute and set other members in its interface.
trans-unit.target: 就開發人員將套用足夠<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>類別屬性，並在其介面中設定其他成員。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ObjectPoolingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string generated by the .NET Framework infrastructure that is checked for a special value that indicates a serviced component.
trans-unit.target: 特殊值，指出服務的元件會檢查.NET Framework 基礎結構所產生的字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute is applied to a serviced component class.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此屬性會套用到服務的元件類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for the maximum size of the pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集區的大小上限的值。

trans-unit.source: MaxPoolSize represents the maximum number of pooled objects that the pooling manager will create, both actively used by clients and inactive in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Sqlserversink 表示要建立集區管理員、 主動使用用戶端和非使用中集區中管理的集區物件的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: When creating objects, the pooling manager checks to verify that the maximum pool size has not been reached and, if it has not, the pooling manager creates a new object to dispense to the client.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件時，集區管理員會檢查確認尚未達到最大集區大小，而且，如果不是，集區管理員會建立新物件以分配給用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If the maximum pool size has been reached, client requests are queued and receive the first available object from the pool in the order in which they arrived.
trans-unit.target: 如果已達到最大集區大小，用戶端要求會排入佇列，並接收它們出現的順序中的集區中的第一個可用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Object creation requests time-out after a specified period.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的要求指定的時間後逾時。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of objects in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 集區中的物件數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for the minimum size of the pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集區的最小的值。

trans-unit.source: MinPoolSize represents the number of objects that are created when the application starts and the minimum number of objects that are maintained in the pool while the application is running.
trans-unit.target: MinPoolSize 代表應用程式啟動時所建立的物件數目與物件在執行應用程式集區中保留的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: If the number of available objects in the pool drops below the specified minimum, new objects are created to meet any outstanding object requests and refill the pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果集區中可用的物件數目低於指定的最小值，以符合任何未處理的物件的要求重新填滿的集區建立新的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the number of available objects in the pool is greater than the minimum number, those surplus objects are destroyed during a clean-up cycle.
trans-unit.target: 如果集區中可用的物件數目大於最小數目，這些多餘的物件被終結時清除循環。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of objects in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 最小集區中的物件數目。
